A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt like The Last Jedi gave us a rougher story to follow and definitely not what the average fan was expecting but in all the I felt it gave what was needed. The story was a tough one to tell but if you pay attention its a strong message to us and to the story. There were scenes i didn’t care for that they could have done differently or even left out but over all I enjoyed the film as a whole and look forward to the next installment.
